Help:Node.title: look
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: look [object]; or look at [object]
EXAMPLE: examine table
Quickly looks at an object. If you wish to learn more detail about an object, use the "examine" command instead, but be aware that the "examine" command takes time and can be seen by everyone in the room, unlike "look".
SEE ALSO: examine
SEE TOPICS:
